sentences.en: For three years matters went bravely on.
sentences.cn: 事情极其顺利地继续了三年.

sentences.en: Go forward bravely, my younger sister, don't look behind.
sentences.cn: 妹妹你大胆地往前走, 莫回头.
他勇敢地承受了一切苦难.

sentences.en: He bravely blinked back his tears.
He bravely went into the burning house to rescue the baby.
sentences.cn: 他勇敢地冲进烈火熊熊的屋子去救那个婴孩.

sentences.en: He fought bravely in many battles and gained their respect.
sentences.cn: 在多次战役中他英勇作战,从而赢得了大家的尊敬.

sentences.en: He fought bravely in the midst of the battle.
sentences.cn: 他在那次战役中奋勇作战.

sentences.en: He fought bravely, haveing his enemies at bay.
sentences.cn: 他英勇战斗, 阻止住了敌人向前推进.

sentences.en: It takes a great deal of courage to face the situation bravely.
sentences.cn: 大胆地正视这一局面需要很大的勇气.

sentences.en: Mr Kim bravely stood up to authority.
sentences.cn: 金先生勇敢地向权威挑战。

sentences.en: Our soldiers advanced bravely against the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我们的士兵勇敢地向敌人挺进.

sentences.en: Our soldiers bravely fought hand to hand with the enemy.
sentences.cn: 我方战士英勇地同敌人展开肉搏战.
她勇敢地承受苦难的遭遇.

sentences.en: She defended herself bravely with her sword.

sentences.cn: 他们勇敢地与灾祸的恶浪搏斗。

words.tran_cn: 难演唱或演奏的；雄壮华丽的
大胆的尝试；令人赞赏的演唱或演奏技巧

trans.tran_cn: 勇敢地，鲜艳地，华丽地，极好地
